statements: SELECT * FROM SavingsPlans;
SELECT plan_name, plan_type, interest_rate FROM SavingsPlans WHERE interest_rate > 3.5;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name FROM SavingsPlans WHERE plan_type = 'Education';
SELECT * FROM SavingsPlans WHERE plan_name LIKE '%Rainbow%';
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, interest_rate FROM SavingsPlans ORDER BY interest_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM SavingsPlans WHERE interest_rate > 5.0 ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT plan_name, plan_type FROM SavingsPlans WHERE plan_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY plan_name ASC;
SELECT plan_id, plan_type, interest_rate FROM SavingsPlans WHERE plan_name LIKE '%Saver%' ORDER BY interest_rate DESC;
SELECT SUM(interest_rate) AS total_interest_rate FROM SavingsPlans;
SELECT DISTINCT plan_type FROM SavingsPlans ORDER BY plan_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM SavingsPlans;
SELECT plan_name, interest_rate FROM SavingsPlans ORDER BY interest_rate DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE plan_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, plan_type, interest_rate FROM SavingsPlans WHERE interest_rate > 5;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, email FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, plan_name, interest_rate FROM Customers JOIN SavingsPlans ON Customers.plan_id = SavingsPlans.plan_id;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, plan_type, interest_rate FROM Customers JOIN SavingsPlans ON Customers.plan_id = SavingsPlans.plan_id WHERE SavingsPlans.interest_rate > 0.05;
SELECT * FROM SavingsPlans;
SELECT plan_name, amount FROM SavingsPlans WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM SavingsPlans WHERE plan_type = 'Retirement';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM PlanDetails WHERE duration BETWEEN 6 AND 12 ORDER BY interest_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM SavingsPlans;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, plan_type FROM SavingsPlans WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY plan_name ASC;
SELECT plan_id, plan_description FROM SavingsPlans WHERE plan_type = 'Fixed' ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlanDetails WHERE interest_rate BETWEEN 3.5 AND 5 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT Customers.customer_name, Customers.customer_email, PlanDetails.duration FROM Customers JOIN PlanDetails ON Customers.customer_id = PlanDetails.plan_id WHERE Customers.customer_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM Savings_Plans
SELECT plan_name, plan_type, monthly_contribution FROM Savings_Plans WHERE plan_type='Flexible'
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT plan_name, maturity_period FROM Savings_Plans WHERE maturity_period > 5
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type='Withdrawal'
SELECT * FROM Savings_Plans WHERE plan_type = 'Fixed';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT plan_name, monthly_contribution FROM Savings_Plans WHERE monthly_contribution > 1000 ORDER BY monthly_contribution DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' AND transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, amount_invested, transaction_date FROM Customers c JOIN Investments i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id JOIN Transactions t ON i.investment_id = t.investment_id WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Savings_Plans;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT plan_name, interest_rate FROM Savings_Plans WHERE end_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT account_id, balance FROM Accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Savings_Plans WHERE interest_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description, start_date, end_date FROM Savings_Plans WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC, plan_name ASC;
SELECT account_id, balance, open_date FROM Accounts WHERE balance < 1000 ORDER BY open_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, transaction_type FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
